channel.title: Donator Items
channel.description: Hi i recently made a spawn server and im wanting to make all chaotic weapons donator and statius and ags plus bandos can someone make a code for me to put in that blocks all of those unless your donator?

item.title: Donator Items
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:13, topic:390210”][quote author=DannyBoy1995 link=topic=486120.msg3562568#msg3562568 date=1302390262]

hmm works for me…

can u tv me and try to help me please!
[/quote]

This is what happens when you try to copy and paste everything…

Basically the first block of errors said(protip: use code/quote tags) that you didn’t finish a statement before the methods. It means that there’s probably something like

public int
public boolean is2Handed(int id) {
    // ...
}

The compiler interprets that as “public int public boolean is2Handed(int id)” which causes it to throw the error.[/quote]
Yeah i did everything im following i vain i’s tut on donator items and he states to put it after the code and i did and i get 100 errors after so i dont know what to do.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Items
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“DannyBoy1995, post:12, topic:390210”][quote author=war of godzz link=topic=486120.msg3562566#msg3562566 date=1302390218]
hmm works for me…
[/quote]
can u tv me and try to help me please![/quote]

This is what happens when you try to copy and paste everything…

Basically the first block of errors said(protip: use code/quote tags) that you didn’t finish a statement before the methods. It means that there’s probably something like

public int
public boolean is2Handed(int id) {
    // ...
}

The compiler interprets that as “public int public boolean is2Handed(int id)” which causes it to throw the error.

Read full topic
